Package hu.bme.mit.theta.sts

Class STS.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.bme.mit.theta.sts.STS.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    STS
    public static final class STS.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for building an STS, supporting multiple initial/transition constraints and invariants.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      STS.Builder addInit​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
      Add an initial expression.
      STS.Builder addInvar​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
      Add an invariant expression.
      STS.Builder addTrans​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
      Add a transition expression.
      STS build()
      Build an STS.
      STS.Builder setProp​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
      Set the property expression.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addInit

        public STS.Builder addInit​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
        Add an initial expression. Multiple initial expressions will be joined into a conjunction.

      • addInvar

        public STS.Builder addInvar​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
        Add an invariant expression. An invariant is added both to the initial and transition expressions.

      • addTrans

        public STS.Builder addTrans​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
        Add a transition expression. Multiple transition expressions will be joined into a conjunction.

      • setProp

        public STS.Builder setProp​(Expr<BoolType> expr)
        Set the property expression. Previously set property will be overridden.

      • build

        public STS build()
        Build an STS. The builder can be modified after building to get new STSs, the already built ones will not be affected.
